Book Creation
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Book Creation
By Split Infinities on Thursday, May 18, 2006 - 06:34 pm:

Question: If the first instance of a monster is combined from 2 correctly raised parents (and therefore the child has higher stats / anima) will the initial book entry reflect the higher stats/anima? Wouldn't that mean an unlimited # of a 2nd generation monster?

Thanks guys!

Split Infinities (SI)

By mayhem on Thursday, May 18, 2006 - 08:08 pm:

No the book seems to keep the basic monster breeds not the exact specs. Imagine what third or fourth gen book monsters would be like.

By Salokin on Tuesday, August 7, 2007 - 12:04 pm:

Yeah. I borrowed a disc from my friend to make a ??? monster and recorded it in my book. When I went to create it it's stats were lower than the discs version of the monster.
